summary: This document is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case. The email was sent to the 'USANYS-EpsteinVictims' distribution list on August 19, 2019, indicating official communication with victims or their representatives.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein Victims
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York forwards a voice message attachment to the 'USANYS-EpsteinVictims' email distribution list.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) maintained an email distribution list specifically for Epstein victims ('USANYS-EpsteinVictims').
Official communication with victims or their representatives occurred via email on August 19, 2019.
A voice message was attached to the email, suggesting potential evidence, testimony, or official updates were being shared.
The document shows the USAO SDNY was actively managing victim communications following Epstein's arrest and death.
